name: Boss Run (RobotScorpion)
description:
Run, get coffee, then shoot it at your boss's face!

Swing through construction sites, drive through busy city streets,  jump over dangerous obstacles, and run all over the city  to collect as many cups of coffee as you can to appease your grumpy, caffeine deprived Boss! 

In Boss Run you play as a nameless employee who must risk their  life to keep their  job and keep  their boss happy. After running through the city fire the coffee you've collected  at the  boss so you can get back to work! 

Try and get a high score in the single player mode or face off against friends and foes in the multiplayer mode. 

Boss Run is a 2-D plat-former developed by team Robot Scorpion in the fall of 2017. 

Robot Scorpion is:

Kristian Acevedo - Lead  Artist, Designer

Thaddeus Tusa - Lead Programmer

Dillon Lynch -Lead  Designer,  Artist
